Title: Shine
Overview: Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.
Tagline: A true story of the mystery of music and the miracle of love
production_companies: Fine Line Features, Australian Film Finance Corporation (AFFC), Film Victoria, South Australian Feature Film Company
Cast: Geoffrey Rush, Noah Taylor, Armin Mueller-Stahl
clean_text: shine pianist david helfgott drive father teacher breakdown year later return piano popular critical acclaim true story mystery music miracle love drama scott hick geoffrey rush noah taylor armin muellerstahl 1996
